price: “Kandi mu by’ukuri umuvumo wanjye uzakubaho kugeza ku munsi w’imperuka.”
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ ٱللَّعۡنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka al-laʿnata ilā yawmi al-dīni
